service_name.description:
Specifies default Zipkin endpoint annotation.
Identifies the application's service

service_address.description: IP address to use with the default Zipkin endpoint annotation

collector_host.description: Host to use when connecting to Zipkin's collector

collector_port.description: Port to use when connecting to Zipkin's collector

reporting_period.description: The time in microseconds between sending successive reports to the collector

max_buffered_spans.description: The maximum number of spans to buffer before sending them to the collector

sample_rate.description: The probability of sampling a span
